reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 367: DESIGNATION OF MATRIMONIAL HOME - FORMS
reg_info.citation: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 367: DESIGNATION OF MATRIMONIAL HOME - FORMS

content.content: 1. A designation of a matrimonial home under subsection 20 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 1.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 367, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. A designation of a matrimonial home under subsection 20 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 1.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 367, s. 1.

content.content: 2. A cancellation of a designation of a matrimonial home under clause 20 (6) (a) of the Act shall be in Form 2.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 367, s. 2. Form 1   DESIGNATION OF MATRIMONIAL HOME Family Law Act Insert regs\graphics\1990\367\367001au.tif  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 367, Form 1. Form 2   CANCELLATION OF DESIGNATION OF MATRIMONIAL HOME Family Law Act Insert regs\graphics\1990\367\367002au.tif  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 367, Form 2.  Français
content.raw_html:
2. A cancellation of a designation of a matrimonial home under clause 20 (6) (a) of the Act shall be in Form 2.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 367, s. 2.
